participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, Alex enjoys expressing herself through music and dreams of making a difference in the world as a doctor.
participant_1.background: I love the band van haven. I want to be a doctor. I play dungeons and dragons. I like going to canada. I wear a lot of purple.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and art, Jordan is laid-back and enjoys collaborating with others to create new sounds.
participant_2.background: I have an eyebrows piercing. My sister and I are in a grunge band. I work at a coffee shop. Both of my parents are teachers.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I play in a grunge band with my sister.
That sounds fun! What's your favorite song to play?
We have a lot of fun playing "Smells Like Teen Spirit" by Nirvana.
That's a great song! I love Nirvana.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
What other bands do you like?
I also like the Foo Fighters, Pearl Jam, and Alice in Chains.
I like those bands too! We have similar taste in music.
What's your favorite thing about being in a band?
I love the feeling of performing live in front of a crowd. It's so exhilarating.
I can imagine! I've never performed live in front of a crowd, but I think it would be amazing.
It's definitely a lot of fun.
Do you have any plans to tour?
We're actually working on our first album right now, and we're hoping to tour once it's released.
That's great! I'll definitely be there to see you perform.
Thanks! We'll let you know when we have more details.
Awesome! I can't wait to see you guys perform.
